tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_regional_group CASCADE; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_regional_group AS SELECT f.activity AS amp_activity_id, org.org_name, org.org_id, sum(f.percentage) AS percentage, COUNT(*) - COUNT(f.percentage) AS cnt_nulls FROM amp_org_role f JOIN ni_all_orgs_dimension org ON org.org_id = f.organisation JOIN amp_role r ON (f.role = r.amp_role_id) AND (r.role_code = 'RG') GROUP BY f.activity, org.org_id, org.org_name;
